title: Episode One: Steve Franks - The Original Super Smeller
description:
Hey all you Psych-O's! It's officially the first episode. I know, you know, that we ARE telling the truth. This week, we have the one and only, creator and showrunner of the show, Steve Franks!
We talk all about Psych, obviously. Like the origin story, the pitch process, the casting process, and how Steve is a little mix of both Shawn and Gus. But, he is the original super smeller! You know that's right. We're so excited to rewatch all of our favorite episodes with you! See you next week.
